articles.title: ASUS launches the ROG Ally X for $799 - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Features a larger battery, increased memory and storage, and improved ergonomics. ASUS has finally launched the ROG Ally X, the company's newest handheld...
articles.content: ASUS has finally launched the ROG Ally X, the company's newest handheld gaming PC, which was initially revealed early last month. This is not the successor to last year's ROG Ally but rather a more e… [+3357 chars]

articles.title: Nvidia's G-Assist is an AI chatbot that guides you through games and optimizes your PC - The Verge
articles.description: Nvidia’s latest tech demo imagines a future where an AI assistant will guide you through a game. G-Assistant was once an April Fools’ prank, but it’s getting close to reality.
